name: Rescue Hero - Minions edition 2014
description:
Rescue Hero-Minions edition 2014 is a new innovative match game!
Objectives differ in over 50 levels to rescue heroes. Among them, many level you can unlock easily, , but there are some hard levels make you stuck for days or for months. Make matches of 3 or more identical minions and you will create blasts! Starts out simple, but things get more and more interesting and challenging when the higher level you reach,the more blocks there are!
Rescue Hero- Minions edition 2014 is rated as the super hit casual game for who loves jewels matching games. Start your jazzy journey in this puzzle adventure! ! More fun with colorful Minions!
Game Features:
● Many challenging levels of Minion heroes
● New tricky blockades
● Stunning and powerful effects
● Play high score in game center
● Small size but super impressive graphics
How to Play:
- Just tap there or more minions of the same color.
- There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage..
- Remember just two rules: The more minions you pop, the more scores you will get and Try to clear all block, you will get a lot of bonus.
Now,let's start our crush minion journey. You will love and be addicted to the fun, creativity and excitement of this great minion game.
